item.title: EP 630 - The Magic Alien Monkey Box
item.itunes:title: The Magic Alien Monkey Box
item.description:
Today we take mushrooms with Lenin, and then we trade our kite for infinite monkeys!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

EP 32 - Grand Soy Unified Theory

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-32-grand-soy-unified-theory

How Vladimir Lenin Became a Mushroom

https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/lenin-mushroom-hoax-russia

Lenin was a mushroom

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lenin_was_a_mushroom

A Parasite From Outer Space: How Sergei Kurekhin proved that Lenin was a mushroom

https://www.academia.edu/633795/A_Parasite_From_Outer_Space_How_Sergei_Kurekhin_proved_that_Lenin_was_a_mushroom

Sergey Kuryokhin: Lenin was a mushroom / С.Курехин: Ленин был грибом, part 1

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h2cs8QLnxlU&ab_channel=xox

Sergey Kuryokhin: Lenin was a mushroom / C.Курехин: Ленин был грибом, part 2

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ExXDxpBFFR0&ab_channel=xox

The 5th Wheel

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_5th_Wheel

“Gifts and Gargoyles” | Paranormal Stories

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OFNBOpH0bA4&feature=youtu.be&ab_channel=BeyondCreepy

UFOs and the ET Presence

https://tinyurl.com/p22tpavm

UBO's (Unidentified Box-like Objects) - Part 1

http://vomanomalous.blogspot.com/2014/06/ubos-unidentified-box-like-objects-part.html?m=1

SCP Foundation

http://www.scpwiki.com/

https://www.latimes.com/archives/la-xpm-2005-jul-31-na-monkeys31-story.html
